name: Purple Paralysis
description: Purple Paralysis, bred by Cream of the Crop, is a sativa-dominant hybrid with potently energizing effects and a hashy lavender aroma. Its genetics are a cross between Power Plant and Lavender, and this strain also goes by the name "Jellyfish Bud."
attributes_title: Sleepy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Happy, Stress, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Headache, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious
